name: Schulte Race
description:
The game is in the testing phase, every feedback is appreciated.

Schulte Table, but more fun ! Train your brain while competing against people around globe to make your place in the leaderboard. Find the numbers and complete the levels as quickly as you can, to get your record into the leaderboard.  Hop in and see how fast your brain is. 

New ? 

Fixed Timer not resetting (Thanks Eshera For bug report)
